name: Specter Desktop
short_description: Bitcoin wallet with hardware device support, multisig, and air-gapped signing.
description: Specter Desktop is a beginner-friendly yet powerful Bitcoin wallet that works with hardware wallets (Ledger, Trezor, etc.), supports multisig configurations, and offers air-gapped signing for enhanced security. It connects to your Bitcoin node for full verification while providing a clean GUI. Features include hardware wallet integration, multisig wallets, PSBT support, node connection, and watch-only wallets.
